villageHall.description: The Village Hall allows you to purchase town structures and earns your kingdom 500 gold per day.
villageHall.name: Village Hall

townHall.description: The Town Hall allows you to purchase town structures and earns your kingdom 1000 gold per day.
townHall.name: Town Hall

cityHall.description: The City Hall allows you to purchase town structures and earns your kingdom 2000 gold per day.
cityHall.name: City Hall

capitol.description: The Capitol earns your kingdom 4000 gold per day.
capitol.name: Capitol

fort.description: The Fort provides your town with defensive walls.
fort.name: Fort

citadel.description: Including a 50% increase to base creature growth, the Citadel adds a keep, and other terrain obstacles, to a town's defenses.
citadel.name: Citadel

castle.description: The Castle adds two arrow towers, fortifies your town's defenses, and doubles base creature growth.
castle.name: Castle

tavern.description: The Tavern increases morale for troops defending the city.
tavern.name: Tavern

blacksmith.description: The Blacksmith provides your armies with First Aid Tents.
blacksmith.name: Blacksmith

marketplace.description: With the Marketplace, you can buy and sell resources (exchange rates increase with each Marketplace you own).
marketplace.name: Marketplace

resourceSilo.description: The Resource Silo provides you with an additional +1 wood and +1 ore each day.
resourceSilo.name: Resource Silo

shipyard.description: The Shipyard allows you to purchase ships.
shipyard.name: Shipyard

ship.description: The Shipyard allows you to purchase ships.
ship.name: Shipyard

special1.description: The Cage of Warlords increases the Defense strength of any visiting hero by +1.
special1.name: Cage of Warlords

special2.description: The Glyphs of Fear add +2 to a garrison hero's defense skill when defending against a siege.
special2.name: Glyphs of Fear

special3.description: The presence of a Blood Obelisk adds +2 to a garrison hero's attack skill when defending against a siege.
special3.name: Blood Obelisk

horde1.description: The Captain's Quarters increase Gnoll production by 6 per week.
horde1.name: Captain's Quarters

horde1Upgr.description: The Captain's Quarters increase Gnoll Marauder production by 6 per week.
horde1Upgr.name: Captain's Quarters

grail.description: The presence of the Carnivorous Plant increases weekly creature generation by 50%, provides your kingdom with an additional 5000 gold each day, and increases the Attack and Defense strength of a garrison hero by +10 each when defending against a siege.
grail.name: Carnivorous Plant

mageGuild1.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.
mageGuild1.name: Mage Guild Level 1

mageGuild2.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.
mageGuild2.name: Mage Guild Level 2

mageGuild3.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.
mageGuild3.name: Mage Guild Level 3

dwellingLvl1.description: The Gnoll Hut allows you to recruit Gnolls.
dwellingLvl1.name: Gnoll Hut

dwellingLvl2.description: The Lizard Den allows you to recruit Lizardmen.
dwellingLvl2.name: Lizard Den

dwellingLvl3.description: The Serpent Fly Hive allows you to recruit Serpent Flies.
dwellingLvl3.name: Serpent Fly Hive

dwellingLvl4.description: The Basilisk Pit allows you to recruit Basilisks.
dwellingLvl4.name: Basilisk Pit

dwellingLvl5.description: The Gorgon Lair allows you to recruit Gorgons.
dwellingLvl5.name: Gorgon Lair

dwellingLvl6.description: The Wyvern Nest allows you to recruit Wyverns.
dwellingLvl6.name: Wyvern Nest

dwellingLvl7.description: The Hydra Pond allows you to recruit Hydras.
dwellingLvl7.name: Hydra Pond

dwellingUpLvl1.description: The Gnoll Hut allows you to recruit Gnoll Marauders.
dwellingUpLvl1.name: Upg. Gnoll Hut

dwellingUpLvl2.description: The Lizard Den allows you to recruit Lizard Warriors.
dwellingUpLvl2.name: Upg. Lizard Den

dwellingUpLvl3.description: The Serpent Fly Hive allows you to recruit Dragon Flies.
dwellingUpLvl3.name: Upg. Serpent Fly Hive

dwellingUpLvl4.description: The Basilisk Pit allows you to recruit Greater Basilisks.
dwellingUpLvl4.name: Upg. Basilisk Pit

dwellingUpLvl5.description: The Gorgon Lair allows you to recruit Mighty Gorgons.
dwellingUpLvl5.name: Upg. Gorgon Lair

dwellingUpLvl6.description: The Wyvern Nest allows you to recruit Wyvern Monarchs.
dwellingUpLvl6.name: Upg. Wyvern Nest

dwellingUpLvl7.description: The Hydra Pond allows you to recruit Chaos Hydras.
dwellingUpLvl7.name: Upg. Hydra Pond
